constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 68 (Tuesday, April 20, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. DAVIDS of Kansas:
H.R. 2683.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 3: The Congress shall have
Power . . . to regulate Commerce with foreign Nations, and
among the several States, and with the Indian Tribes
By
[Page H1999]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

title: Helping Communities Invest in Infrastructure Act
